product_name: Primal Wear Floresco Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: This summer, get into racing form fast with the performance fit of the Floresco Bike Jersey for men from Primal Wear. Q3 Elite fabric with square-grid texture wicks moisture and dries fast, while AE Elite mesh delivers superb ventilation. Construction offers 4-way stretch to free up movement. Full-length hidden zipper provides maximum ventilation; flatlock seams feel non-irritating on the skin. Silicone waist gripper holds jersey in place as you ride. Primal Wear Floresco Bike Jersey features a race-cut fit and 3 easy-access angled rear pockets.
short_description: This summer, get into racing form fast with the performance fit of the Floresco Bike Jersey for men from Primal Wear.
